name: LPG above ground storage tank, water capacity 100.000 liters
description:
Design Code: ASME SEC VIII DIV II
Design Pressure: 17,5 kg/cm² + static head
Inside diameter: 3.500 mm ID
Hydro test pressure: 25 kg/cm²
Corrosion allowance: 1,5 mm
Radiography: 100%
Joint Efficiency: 1,0
Heat Tratment: stress relieving of tank
Dished type: hemispherical
Shell thickness: 20 mm
Dishend thickness: 12 mm
Overall lenght of tank: 11,6 meter
Manhole: 450 NB XSORF ANSI 300# - 1 No
Saddle support: 2 No.´s
Third party inspection: M/S DNV-GL
.
Painting specification:
Sand blast to SA 2-1/2
Zinc rich epoxy primer: 50 micron
Intermediate coat: 150 micron
Final paint: PU paint, 50 micron
Total DFT: 200 micron
.
Material of construction:
Shell dished ends, RF pads: SA-516 GR-70
Manhole & nozzle flanges: ASTM A 105
Nozzle pipes: SA 106 GR B
Couplings: SA 105
Studs/nuts: SA 193 GR.L7 / SA 194 GR 4
Gasket: S.S304 spiral wounded
& asbestos free
